column2: The Iberian Red Federation
After emerging victorious from the civil war, it is time to unify Iberia once again, but not as before, but rather as a new Iberian Union, a Syndicalist Iberian Union.
Carlist Victory
After a hard war we have won the civil war glory to Carlist Spain
Sending immigrants to Hungary
After the dissolution of Austria-Hungary and the creation of the federation, we have received many immigrants. We need to get rid of them by sending them to Hungary.
Sending immigrants to Hungary
After the dissolution of Austria-Hungary and the creation of the federation, we have received many immigrants. We need to get rid of them by sending them to Hungary.
Sending immigrants to Hungary
After the dissolution of Austria-Hungary and the creation of the federation, we have received many immigrants. We need to get rid of them by sending them to Hungary.
Sending immigrants to Hungary
After the dissolution of Austria-Hungary and the creation of the federation, we have received many immigrants. We need to get rid of them by sending them to Hungary.
Dissolve the federation.
After winning the war, it's time to end the Austrian lies and liberate ourselves.
Genocide in Hungary.
The Hungarian people decided to kill the immigrants we sent
Imperial matters.
After the annexation of Hungary, the other members of the federation do not view us favorably. What should we do?
Reform the nation.
After defeating our former allies, we have shown our strength, and it's time to reform the great Austrian Empire.
Expand in Switzerland
We have to show that Austria is and always was the true German heresy.
Expand into the Kaiserreich
It's time to show who is the real Germany
Form Germany under the Austrian crown
After regaining hegemony in southern Germany, it is time to show that we are the true and only Germany
Ideas for a union
After the crisis in Hungary, the union was on the brink of dissolution. We need to restore order.
Attack the italians
Prepare the integration plan
Attack Bohemia
we have to do whatever it takes to unify the federation
Finish off polish puppet
There is little left to end the plan
Finish unification
We are close to unify we just have to finish with the last 3 countries
Unify the Danube Federation
we have managed to unify all of austria it is time to reform the federation, the danubian federation
Defeat in Austrian unification

After the disastrous military campaign of unification, we have nothing left but to surrender and talk with the Austrians to re-establish the union and recover the glory of the Austro-Hungarian Empire.
Syndicalist Saviors
After the war, Italy was devastated, only the syndicalist union could restore the Italian nation.
Nationalists in the Italian people
In the streets they hear of a new hope for Italy, a new Italy, a red Italy
March South
Our leaders indicate a clear objective the security of Rome
The fate of the pope
The plan would be to take Rome the problem that is in the hands of the Pope and the majority of the population is Catholic. this can define the fate of all of italy
Victory for the Italian trade unionist
After winning a hard war we have shown that we are the legitimate heirs of Italy
Attack sicily
We have to understand the Italian state
Attack Sardinia
We have to understand the Italian state
End republican Italy
We have to understand the Italian state
Italian unification
After years of conflicts we have managed to unify all of Italy

To maintain status in government we must expand papal domains

To maintain status in government we must expand papal domains

The Pope told us that we have to destroy the Italian Republic
Ceding venice
To maintain status in government we must expand papal domains
Catholic revolution
The pope proclaimed that the only way to restore Italy is the papal way and it's time for revolution
Papal victory
After winning the civil war it is time to program a new italy
Ideas of the Italian Empire
After the war, Italy was divided, it's time to restart
Protect the papacy
The papacy has fallen, it's time for them to return to real Italian hands.
Take Tuscany
The poor Italian people in Tuscany have to be released
Liberate central Italy
We are close to repelling the forces of the Italian revolution, it is time to liberate the center of Italy.
Recover Sardinia-Piedmont
It's time to end everything and recover the last part of Italy
Proclaim the Italian Empire
After years of conflicts, King Victor Emmanuel III returns to Italy to proclaim the new empire
Reunify the Portuguese crowns
The chaos in Europe leads us to reunify the recovered empire Brazil

column2: Form Spanish Commonwealth
Now that we have restored the viceroyalties we have to gather all the Hispanic people to fight against the power of the kaisereich
Unify Iberia
After winning the civil war we have managed to establish a period of domination and we have to extend it to Portugal
Recover the island of Sardinia
Our generals decided that the most important thing was to recover the glorious European empire to face the influence of the Kaisereich
Recover the two sicilies
After the war of the Spanish succession, we lost control of the two Sicilies, it is time to recover them
Take back belgium
After the great war the domain of Belgium fell under German rule, that must end
Take back Netherlands and Luxerburg
Now that we've got the Belgium back it's time to get the Spanish Netherlands back
take back ireland
Ireland became independent in the civil war it's time for them to come back
Take back normandy
Our ancestors had Normandy in their possession, it's time for them to return.
Annex britannia
It's time to expand into France
Expand into the south of France
Now that we ve mastered the north of France it's time to head south
Finish off the french
It s time to take over the former territory of the Angevin empire and wipe out the French country
Form Syndicalist Union
It is time we have to unite the syndicalist revolts in a single flag
Future plans
Now we have to see what to do so that the nation returns to the top
Execute the plans
We have 2 offers for the country to become a great power number 1 again
Take back ireland
Ireland became independent in the civil war it's time for them to come back
Restore the dominoes in a new red flag
After the great war the British dominions became independent, it is time for them to return whether they want to or not
British pride
Now that we have regained the empire we have to start with a system of indoctrination in the newly annexed regions.
Prepare the counter revolution
After the revolution, the situation has not improved, we have to plan a strategy so that the king returns to the lathe
The Second Civil War
We have recruited the royalist troops to prepare the return of the king at any cost
Victory
Now we have to reorganize ourselves and notify some of our few faithful colonies to return to the country
Regain influence in Ireland
After the war we lost Ireland thanks to the Germans it's time they came back
Recover South Africa
The first step to recover the old empire
Crown jewel
For a long time, India was one of the most useful colonies. We have to start the reconquest by the countries loyal to Great Britain.
Regain dominance in Oceania
The last colony we are missing would be the former Austria
End the reconquest of India
After conquering Australia we need to conquer the jewel in the crown to recover our dominance in the world
Form the Commonwealth
To avoid what happened to Great Britain we have to form a confederation of Commonwealth countries
Victory in the Spanish Civil War
After so much time we have won the war now we have to see what direction the government will take
Form the Iberian union
The only way to protect Iberia is to unite in a single flag
Unite the house of bourbon
In the Spanish Succession war we reached a dynastic unity between the kingdom of France and Spain it is time for the 2 crowns to return
Expand throughout Spain
The civil war broke out after securing Galicia, the only way to defend the Spanish was to unite it with Portugal in a new Iberian union.
End the domination of Spain in Iberia
For many times we were in the shadow of Spain in Europe and America that must change
Procramate the domain in Iberia
Now that we have finished with Spain, it is time to unify Iberia once and for all
Expand into southern Germany
Now we have to take southern Germany
Establish the idea of a new Germanic federation
We have seen that the German empire is not what it was before, it is time to reunify Germany with a new country with a plague capital.
Create the new German confederation
The original Germanic union left many Germans like the Austrians and Luxembourg. It is time we changed that with this new confederation.
Gather the Slavs to southern Poland
Now that we have managed to Unify Czechoslovakia, it is time to unify the Slavs into a single nation, starting with the Poles.
Free the Poles
Now we have to finish annexing the Slavs into a single flag
Create the union of the Slavs
The Slavic people were always discriminated against by the Germans, the Austrians, etc. It is time to form a strong empire. It is time to form Zapadoslavia.
